docs.title: Welcome
docs.text: Welcome to the documentation for the osnabrugge Helm charts project.

docs.title: Getting started
docs.text:
Helm must be installed to use the charts in this repository.

Refer to Helm's documentation to get started.

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
helm repo add osnabrugge http://osnabrugge.github.io/helm-charts/

You can then run helm search repo osnabrugge to search the charts.

docs.title: How do I find people running Kubernetes at home?
Discord
docs.text: Join the k8s-at-home Discord community on Discord.

docs.title: Repository topics
docs.text:
Have a look at people running Kubernetes at home on GitHub and

on GitLab.

docs.title: Awesome Home Kubernetes
docs.text: Checkout our curation of projects and resources involving running Kubernetes at home.
